title: Santa Veigar Baleful strike hit sound using default sound
body:
Bad Santa Veigar had a unique hitsound  "Crunchy cookie" which has now reverted to his default hitsound.

Cast his 1st ability "Baleful Strike"

Expected  "Crunchy cookie":
http://youtu.be/IYZoGr7CKLM?t=33s

Live  "Magical cookie":
http://youtu.be/5R_oyyZqZOY?t=51s

replies.body:
Hey shinijumanjiman! 

Thank you for the report! We're currently working on a fix! :]
